attributes.action: Students Should Be Able To Wear What They Want To School.
attributes.additional_details: Allowing Students to wear their own clothes allows them to embrace their creativity and uniqueness through their clothing. It will make them feel more confident and will allow them to embrace their inner artist. Letting Students wear Non-School Uniform will give them a self esteem boost and a good mindset in lesson knowing they look good, they feel good. It is also proven that school uniform can be from £20-£250 so why buy a school uniform you can only wear in school, you can wear them wherever.
attributes.background: Students have to get dressed in the same uniform everyday, why not let the students embrace their own unique style. It will let students feel confident at school and have a learning mindset.
